mdRecord.dcterms:title: Large Walking Spinning Wheel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Large Walking Spinning Wheel The spinning wheel belonged to Eva Jane Slusher Quesenberry and was down to her daughter-in-law, Amanda Goad Quesenberry. Cordova Quesenberry Phillips owned it next and passed it to her daughter, Mary Ruth Phillips Heafner.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Spinning
Spinning-wheel
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
